original_text: I already wrote a letter to you. I told you that you must not be friends with people who have sex in wrong ways.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 쓴 편지에 음행하는 자들을 사귀지 말라 하였거니와

sentences.original_text: I already wrote a letter to you
that you must not be friends
with people who have sex in wrong ways
